speaker: STANLEY
text:
Sir
               
              Christopher
              ,
               
              tell
               
              Richmond
               
              this
               
              from
               
              me
              :

speaker: STANLEY
text:
That
               
              in
               
              the
               
              sty
               
              of
               
              the
               
              most
               
              deadly
               
              boar

speaker: STANLEY
text:
My
               
              son
               
              George
               
              Stanley
               
              is
               
              franked
               
              up
               
              in
               
              hold
              ;

speaker: STANLEY
text:
If
               
              I
               
              revolt
              ,
               
              off
               
              goes
               
              young
               
              George’s
               
              head
              ;

speaker: STANLEY
text:
The
               
              fear
               
              of
               
              that
               
              holds
               
              off
               
              my
               
              present
               
              aid
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
So
               
              get
               
              thee
               
              gone
              .
               
              Commend
               
              me
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              lord
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Withal
              ,
               
              say
               
              that
               
              the
               
              Queen
               
              hath
               
              heartily
               
              consented

speaker: STANLEY
text:
He
               
              should
               
              espouse
               
              Elizabeth
               
              her
               
              daughter
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
But
               
              tell
               
              me
              ,
               
              where
               
              is
               
              princely
               
              Richmond
               
              now
              ?

speaker: CHRISTOPHER
text:
At
               
              Pembroke
              ,
               
              or
               
              at
               
              Ha’rfordwest
               
              in
               
              Wales
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
What
               
              men
               
              of
               
              name
               
              resort
               
              to
               
              him
              ?

speaker: CHRISTOPHER
text:
Sir
               
              Walter
               
              Herbert
              ,
               
              a
               
              renownèd
               
              soldier
              ;

speaker: CHRISTOPHER
text:
Sir
               
              Gilbert
               
              Talbot
              ,
               
              Sir
               
              William
               
              Stanley
              ,

speaker: CHRISTOPHER
text:
Oxford
              ,
               
              redoubted
               
              Pembroke
              ,
               
              Sir
               
              James
               
              Blunt
              ,

speaker: CHRISTOPHER
text:
And
               
              Rice
               
              ap
               
              Thomas
              ,
               
              with
               
              a
               
              valiant
               
              crew
              ,

speaker: CHRISTOPHER
text:
And
               
              many
               
              other
               
              of
               
              great
               
              name
               
              and
               
              worth
              ;

speaker: CHRISTOPHER
text:
And
               
              towards
               
              London
               
              do
               
              they
               
              bend
               
              their
               
              power
              ,

speaker: CHRISTOPHER
text:
If
               
              by
               
              the
               
              way
               
              they
               
              be
               
              not
               
              fought
               
              withal
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Well
              ,
               
              hie
               
              thee
               
              to
               
              thy
               
              lord
              .
               
              I
               
              kiss
               
              his
               
              hand
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
My
               
              letter
               
              will
               
              resolve
               
              him
               
              of
               
              my
               
              mind
              .

speaker: STANLEY
text:
Farewell
              .
